subtitle: Using basic ingredients, this mid-week meal is economical and very tasty.

method.text: Put the beef, onion and carrot in a pan. Cook on a low heat until the meat has browned and the vegetables have softened.
Add the stock, lentils, herbs and seasoning. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 30 min or until the lentils are tender.
While the meat is cooking, boil the potatoes and swede together until just soft. Drain. Mash. Stir in the milk and half the cheese. Season  Serve with remaining cheese sprinkled over the mash.

title: Beef and lentil pie
